Name: East Indian
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Fragata Green Olives .
Review: Dry and pretty flat (like much of India) but perfectly balanced with subtle hints of orange zest.
Nutrition: One serving of East Indian contains 108 calories
